recipesJson.name: Uslodon
recipesJson.author: benyar
recipesJson.description:
Watermelon strawberry.  Named by the app.  Too lazy to change it.  Sounds like swedish death metal, which is nice for such a fruity flavor.

To do:  Maybe try to add some white peach.  Also receive tons of criticism.

reviews.text: 5 Stars for the joke.  Those crazy Swedes. The Danes are great too.
